feed.title: go-proxy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: 0.4.8
entry.content:
Changes in v0.4.8

Improvements: - Better error output formating - Cert renewal no longer renew every 3 days, now it renews 1 month before expiry

New features:

  • New set_headers and hide_headers options

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed udp stream selecting wrong port
  • Fixed startup crash for file provider
  • Added environment variables to override port for http, https and api server
  • For other changes, see changelog from 0.4.8 to 0.5.0-rc6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.4.8...0.5.0

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.1
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed host default to localhost even for remote docker client
  • Fixed one error in provider causing all routes not to load
  • Fixed some error message missing subject

Full Changelog: https://github.com/yusing/go-proxy/compare/0.5.0...0.5.1

entry.title: New release for go-proxy: v0.5.2
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Fixed wrong default value for host in some scenerios
  • Fixed possible resource leak for docker watcher
  • Fixed go-proxy ls-* options stuck when there's a failing docker provider
  • Changed docker watcher will now reconnect every 3 secs on failure until cancel
  • Old: returns error after three trials, does not reconnect even when docker provider recovered
  • Changed environment variables GOPROXY_*_PORT to GOPROXY_*_ADDR, now api server defaults to listening on "127.0.0.1:8888" instead of ":8888"
